messages.message:
:red_circle: Hi!
If you're finding that your sandbox builds / updates don't work suddenly, particularly with errors like:
```stderr: fatal: couldn't find remote ref refs/heads/<your_branch>```
You've fallen prey to yet another of my _diabolically_ clever tech pranks!

... Actually, you're running into one of the downsides to using arbitrary forks of the prime repo `instabase/instabase`. :upside_down_face:

I'm testing a fix now, but that takes a while to complete.

In the meantime, you can:
1. Push your branch to the upstream/prime repo at `instabase/instabase` (forks don't bring any benefit :slightly_smiling_face:) and then switch the fork in the ICC UI
2. Rebuild your sandbox as-is, but set the *Advanced* -> *Pipeline Branch* field to `releng-637-rollback`
I'll update here once the fix (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59688) is merged!

Alrighty, dinner's done, and so are the sandbox builds - going to merge the fix now and as always, please let us know if anything goes sideways with the new builds! Thanks for your input and patience as we move things along! :slightly_smiling_face:
